text: 2.3 Lom 16.18, 2 Ko 12.17-18, 1 Te 2.5, 1 Ti 6.5, Tat 1.11, 2 Pi 1.16 Bɨ kɨli takaw tep agñobun agɨl yepɨs agɨnɨgabal anɨb okok, tap chɨn ke kuŋay yɨbɨl dun agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨgabal. Mani tap nɨbi ak dɨnɨgun agɨl, nɨbop takaw yepɨs yepɨs kuŋay yɨbɨl agɨnɨgabal. Anɨgɨnɨgabal ak pen, bɨlel God ne kɨlop tɨg asɨk bɨlokɨnɨgayn agɨl, ñɨn anɨb ak aglak mɨdeb. Aglɨl mɨdɨl, mɨd dad amɨl, ñɨn aglak anɨb ak apek, God kɨlop tɨg asɨk bɨlokek yul awl yɨbɨl dɨl kul gɨnɨgabal. Pen bɨ anɨb okok, kɨli God chɨnop tɨg asɨk ma bɨlokɨnɨgab agɨl, gos anɨb ak ma nɨgɨnɨgel. Mel yɨbɨl.
